articles.author: Nadeen Ebrahim, Laura Paddison
articles.title: Aging dams and missed warnings: A lethal mix of factors caused Africa’s deadliest flood disaster - CNN
articles.description: It started with a bang at 3 a.m. Monday as the residents of Derna were sleeping. One dam burst, then a second, sending a huge wave of water gushing down through the mountains towards the coastal Libyan city, killing thousands as entire neighborhoods were swep…
